content:
# It appears that I'm still unable to harvest stone from the patch, despite it being available. 
# This could be due to my position relative to the stone patch or an issue with the harvesting function.

# To troubleshoot, I will first confirm my current position and ensure that I am indeed standing on the stone patch.
current_position = get_player_position()
print(f'Current position: {current_position}')

# If I am not on the stone patch, I will move closer to it.
if not is_near(current_position, stone_position):
    move_to(stone_position)
    print("Moving closer to the stone patch...")

# After ensuring I'm in the right position, I will attempt to harvest stone again.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=20)
print(f'Attempting to harvest {harvested_stone} stone from the patch.')
print(f"Updated inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
